properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST WHERE USER_ID = ? AND NOTICE_NUM = ?
INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( NOTICE_NUM , USER_ID , WISH_NUM , WISH_STATUS , LESSON_DATE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , WISH_SEQ.NEXTVAL , DEFAULT , ? )

SELECT W.NOTICE_NUM , W.WISH_NUM , W.LESSON_DATE , N.NOTICE_TITLE , C.C_PRICE , C.C_CATEGORY , C.C_LOCATION , C.C_TIME1 , C.C_TIME2 , C.V_DATE , T.ROUTE , T.CHANGE_NAME FROM NOTICE N, CLASS C, WISHLIST W, TBL_FILE T WHERE N.NOTICE_NUM = C.NOTICE_NUM AND N.NOTICE_NUM = W.NOTICE_NUM AND C.NOTICE_NUM = T.NOTICE_NUM AND W.WISH_STATUS = 'Y' AND N.NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND N.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND W.USER_ID = ? AND T.FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY W.WISH_NUM DESC
UPDATE WISHLIST SET LESSON_DATE = ? WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ? AND USER_ID = ?
UPDATE WISHLIST SET WISH_STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND WISH_NUM = ?

SELECT N.NOTICE_NUM , N.NOTICE_TITLE , C.C_PRICE , C.C_CATEGORY , C.C_TIME1 , C.C_TIME2 , C.V_DATE , T.ROUTE , T.CHANGE_NAME FROM NOTICE N, CLASS C, TBL_FILE T WHERE N.NOTICE_NUM = C.NOTICE_NUM AND T.NOTICE_NUM = C.NOTICE_NUM AND N.NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND N.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND T.FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND N.NOTICE_NUM = ?
